announcements.title: Summer Events
announcements.content: Check out our upcoming summer events including the famous Irwin Car Cruise!

featuredEvents.title: Irwin Car Cruise 2026
featuredEvents.description: Join us for the biggest car cruise in the region! Classic cars, live music, and family fun.

featuredEvents.title: Summer Farmers Market
featuredEvents.description: Fresh local produce, artisan goods, and community connection in Downtown Irwin.

featuredEvents.title: Fall Harvest Festival
featuredEvents.description: Celebrate the harvest season with local vendors, pumpkin decorating, and autumn treats.
